directions.step:
From: pippa@parcplace.com (Pippa Dillman)
Date: 5 Aug 1994 16:31:57 -0400
Mix well dry cake mix, eggs and applesauce. Set aside. Mix sugar and cinnamon. grease and flour bunt pan (or cake pan). Pour half of batter in pan, swirl in half of sugar mixture. Pour in the remaining batter and swirl remaining sugar mixture. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. (If using flat pan bake about 40 minutes)

/CAKES
